org.forgerock.openam.sts.publish.common

Class STSInstanceConfigStoreBase<T extends STSInstanceConfig>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.sts.publish.common.STSInstanceConfigStoreBase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    STSInstanceConfigStore<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RestSTSInstanceConfigStore, SoapSTSInstanceConfigStore

    public abstract class STSInstanceConfigStoreBase<T extends STSInstanceConfig>
extends Object
implements STSInstanceConfigStore<T>
    See Also:
    This class represents the concerns of accessing the SMS to persist and obtain the configuration state corresponding to rest and soap sts instances - i.e. access to the state corresponding to RestSTSInstanceConfig and SoapSTSInstanceConfig instances.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      STSInstanceConfigStoreBase(InstanceConfigMarshaller<T> instanceConfigMarshaller, String serviceName, org.slf4j.Logger logger) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<T> getAllPublishedInstances()
      This method will be called by some startup context in the {locally|remotely} deployed {REST|SOAP} STS context to obtain all of the previously-published STS instances.
      List<T> getPublishedInstances(String realm)
      This method will be called by some startup context in the remotely deployed SOAP STS context to obtain all of the previously-published soap STS instances for a given realm, as a soap-sts deployment is specific to a given realm.
      T getSTSInstanceConfig(String stsInstanceId, String realm)
      Returns the STSInstanceConfig subclass corresponding to the stsInstanceId parameter.
      boolean isInstancePresent(String stsId, String realm)
      This method returns whether STS instance config referenced by the realm and id is present in the SMS.
      void persistSTSInstance(String stsInstanceId, String realm, T instance)
      Persists the STS instance into the SMS.
      void removeSTSInstance(String stsInstanceId, String realm)
      Removes the sts instance corresponding to the id from the SMS.
      void updateSTSInstance(String stsInstanceId, String realm, T instance)
      Updates attributes corresponding to the existing STS instance.

      • persistSTSInstance

        public void persistSTSInstance(String stsInstanceId,
                               String realm,
                               T instance)
                        throws STSPublishException
        Persists the STS instance into the SMS.
        Specified by:
        persistSTSInstance in interface STSInstanceConfigStore<T extends STSInstanceConfig>
        Parameters:
        stsInstanceId - the identifier for the to-be-published sts instance
        realm - The realm in which the sts instance should be deployed
        instance - The to-be-persisted state.
        Throws:
        STSPublishException - if the SMS encounters a problem during persistence.

      • removeSTSInstance

        public void removeSTSInstance(String stsInstanceId,
                              String realm)
                       throws STSPublishException
        Removes the sts instance corresponding to the id from the SMS.
        Specified by:
        removeSTSInstance in interface STSInstanceConfigStore<T extends STSInstanceConfig>
        Parameters:
        stsInstanceId - The id of the to-be-removed sts instance.
        realm - the realm in which the sts instance was deployed. Necessary for SMS lookup.
        Throws:
        STSPublishException - if the SMS encounters an error during the removal.

      • getSTSInstanceConfig

        public T getSTSInstanceConfig(String stsInstanceId,
                              String realm)
                       throws STSPublishException
        Returns the STSInstanceConfig subclass corresponding to the stsInstanceId parameter.
        Specified by:
        getSTSInstanceConfig in interface STSInstanceConfigStore<T extends STSInstanceConfig>
        Parameters:
        stsInstanceId - the identifier of the sts
        realm - the realm in which the sts instance was deployed. Necessary for SMS lookup.
        Returns:
        the SoapSTSInstanceConfig or RestSTSInstanceConfig instance corresponding to this published instance.
        Throws:
        STSPublishException - if no instance could be found, or if the SMS encountered an error during the lookup.

      • getAllPublishedInstances

        public List<T> getAllPublishedInstances()
                                 throws STSPublishException
        Description copied from interface: STSInstanceConfigStore
        This method will be called by some startup context in the {locally|remotely} deployed {REST|SOAP} STS context to obtain all of the previously-published STS instances. The publish service will be called with all obtained instances. This will the set of published STS instances to be reconstituted following a server restart.
        Specified by:
        getAllPublishedInstances in interface STSInstanceConfigStore<T extends STSInstanceConfig>
        Returns:
        A non-null, but possibly empty list containing all of the STSInstanceConfig subclasses corresponding to published rest or soap sts instances.
        Throws:
        STSPublishException - if the realm names, necessary to obtain the sts instances published in each, could not be obtained.

      • getPublishedInstances

        public List<T> getPublishedInstances(String realm)
                              throws STSPublishException
        Description copied from interface: STSInstanceConfigStore
        This method will be called by some startup context in the remotely deployed SOAP STS context to obtain all of the previously-published soap STS instances for a given realm, as a soap-sts deployment is specific to a given realm.
        Specified by:
        getPublishedInstances in interface STSInstanceConfigStore<T extends STSInstanceConfig>
        Returns:
        The List of STSInstanceConfig instances (possibly empty) corresponding to the set of previously-published instances in the specified realm.
        Throws:
        STSPublishException

      • isInstancePresent

        public boolean isInstancePresent(String stsId,
                                 String realm)
                          throws STSPublishException
        Description copied from interface: STSInstanceConfigStore
        This method returns whether STS instance config referenced by the realm and id is present in the SMS. It is called by RestSTSPublishServiceRequestHandler#handleUpdate to determine whether the referenced sts id actually corresponds to a previously-published instance
        Specified by:
        isInstancePresent in interface STSInstanceConfigStore<T extends STSInstanceConfig>
        Parameters:
        stsId - The unique identifier for a particular STSInstanceConfig. Currently obtained by calling RestSTSInstanceConfig#getDeploymentSubPath.
        realm - the realm in which the sts instance was deployed. Necessary for SMS lookup.
        Returns:
        true if the instance is present
        Throws:
        STSPublishException - If an exception is encountered consulting the SMS.
